component.name: ContentReader
component.script:
sub init() m.top.functionName = "getcontent" end sub
sub getcontent() print "in ContentReader getcontent()" print "m.top.contenturi is " m.top.contenturi
content = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode")
contentxml = createObject("roXMLElement")
' uncomment/conditionalize for development package XML transfers (pkg:/server/foo.xml) xmlstring = ReadAsciiFile(m.top.contenturi) contentxml.parse(xmlstring)
if contentxml.getName()="Content"
for each item in contentxml.GetNamedElements("item") print "this is contentxml" item.getAttributes().feed_url
itemcontent = content.createChild("ContentNode") itemcontent.setFields(item.getAttributes()) node = createObject("roSGNode","grid_node")
node.feed_url = item.getAttributes().feed_url
itemcontent.appendChild(node) print "in ContentReader something " itemcontent.getChild(0) end for end if
m.top.content = content end sub
